title: Anna Faris and co-stars talk 80s rom-com remake 'Overboard'
text:
Anna Faris and co-stars talk 80s rom-com remake 'Overboard' Wednesday, May 02, 2018 - 01:56
The cast of 'Overboard' discuss the reimagining of the classic 1980s rom-com, which starred Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell. Rough cut. (No reporter narration)
